text: Thera () was a town of Ancient Caria. It is mentioned by Arrian as one of the towns held by Orontobates.Arrian, The Anabasis of Alexander, 2.5. Its site is located near Yerkesik, Muğla Province, Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Caria Category:Former populated places in Turkey
title: Thera (Caria)
